title: Admins won't, we will!

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
**EVERY ** game I have played today has been half bots.
There is nothing I find more frustrating in a game than when a player runs straight down the lane and attacks the enemy tower when the game starts. One bot is enough to secure a loss for the entire team, the team I versed in the linked match had only 1 player and 4 bots. My team only had 1 confirmed bot so of course we destroyed the poor guy.
Can people **PLEASE** make sure you report bots for boosting and cheating. This issue is not yet being taken seriously by the admins so we are going to have to get every bot banned manually. Also, be careful to report confirmed bots and not crappy players. Reporting the wrong players will get your reports muted.


_**Dear admins**_

_**Would you please do the community a favor and put in a function where people can vote to remove a player from the game**_. Make it so that if the 'bot' does not vote against it then they get instantly kicked and a 1 week temp ban. As I previously mentioned, 1 bot wrecks the game. I would rather play with 1 less teammate than have a teammate go 0/18/2.

**Thank you
    `` ant``**

replies.body:
I played 4 games with a level 30 player on ARAM and there was no bots. He then left and I played 2 games with a player who wasn't level 30. One of those games only had 3 human players, one being on the enemy team and my friend and I on the other. The other game had 4 human players, two on each team.
Maybe I should just get to level 30 so it is no longer an issue.
I have found a repetition in bot names and I can tell which players are bots. Just look at my match history and find players that die 5 times as much as their kills. Occasionally one has a single number as the 3rd last character. Most of them have two words, both starting with capital letters but both spelled incorrectly. The rest are just random letters with a few capitals. All have rather long names that don't make sense.

Your best bet is probably just to try playing normals until you get to lvl 30. If you're level 24 it shouldn't take too long and then you won't have to worry about them anymore. It's a problem for sure but it's one you don't have control over. So report it and find a work around. You've already done the first bit so I wish you good luck getting to 30 and hopefully not having to play with bots anymore :)

What the hell are these voting options? They all carry negative connotations, how can you expect people to vote with them?

I've encountered many bots in co-op vs AI, but not to my knowledge in ARAM matches.

I'm not sure I understand what you mean. For the first few days of an update that targets bots there will be a massive decline in the amount of bots because they wont be able to vote no. They don't even vote in the surrender votes.
On the other hand, you cant kick an active player because they will just click no. You could get rid of AFK players but there is no point to that as at least they aren't feeding.

i hate that guy who uses a sona bot, so god damn annoying, had them twice in a row. The ai attaches her as a supp to the champ nearest to her on spawn and she follows them all game, once it was a jgler attached, other it was a mid it attached to. I looked at its history and its kinda obvious when that person has 972 sona games on record, with 95% being the exact same build, same spells, same order, same everything
I only play ARAM so i have not encountered this, at least it would help a bit rather than rushing the towers.
Never in my 3 1/2 years of playing league have i encountered this. I'm intrigued, doe's it happen only in certain game modes?

It happens a bit in level 5-29 ARAM and sometimes low elo(I normally play with new players in this game mode because they have lives and don't spend every spare second at home sitting down on the League boards or in the client.)

Normal people can play modes other than ARAM mate, I have two kids and a full time job, and manage to get in atleast 1 game every evening, I don't play ARAM which probably explains why I haven't seen any bots.

I play ARAMs relatively frequently and I've never seen a bot outside of a bot game (I mean a bot with an account not the ones you're vsing). As I understand it happens in <30 ARAMs and some very low elo norms...but I have honestly never seen one in an actual pvp game.
That is unusually strange, perhaps they all use Oceania. What do you use?
I'm on OCE. That said, I didn't play ARAMs really till I hit..well I was well past lvl 30 at least.
That might be the difference. I'm still lvl 24

ARAM, I get it a lot. Almost every game has a bot.
I love ARAM but I can't play because there are never any good games :'(
Usually happens in ARAM for leveling up smurfs or new accounts.
Yea, it has become too popular in ARAM matches

I don't rage as much anymore so I would be more like I don't rage, then I report them.

P.S. Riot don't deal with these Summoners because not many people report them.
Instead of hating on me for posting wrong, please just vote :)
